about_the_game:
Jennifer, a young mage, finds herself trapped in a mysterious floating castle formed by a dimensional distortion. On her journey, she must face relentless challenges while searching for a way out and her lost love. With every room she explores, the castle unveils dark secrets and puzzles that test her strength and resolve.

To escape, Jennifer must battle hordes of ruthless enemies, unlock unique abilities, and uncover magical secrets hidden in every corner of the castle. The treacherous architecture and concealed dangers make every step a challenge, and time seems to be against her in this perilous quest.

Curse of Diamond delivers an intense action and exploration experience, inspired by the metroidvania genre. Will Jennifer manage to escape the castle and save what she loves most, or will she be consumed by its enigmatic mysteries? Embark on a thrilling journey in a world filled with magic, danger, and unexpected choices.
